Convex Analysis # Here is our cost function $$ \underset{x}{min} ||A\cdot X - B||_2^2 $$ This is a quadratic function of \(X\) and is always non-negative. We can use this property to prove its convexity. Convex Function # \(\text{If a quadratic function is always non-negative}\\\ \text{its quadratic coefficient matrix is positive semi-definite ...(1)}\) \(\text{A quadratic function is convex,}\\\ \text{if and only if its coefficient matrix is positive semi-definite.
